_xResult.title: Going Gets Tough Set
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made jacket and pant set with drop crotch
_xResult.longdesc:
Sometimes, winter days make it harder than most to spring out of bed and merrily make it to work for the day. Luckily, EUG has us covered. They created this custom made jacket and pant set that pairs perfectly for days that call for a go-to stylish outfit. The red and black jacket features a hood, full-length zipper front, fabric belt and unique button closures at the top. The custom made pants are a simple black cotton and wool blend with a drop crotch that adds style.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
